section.p: This class contains a log of actions that have been taken on this outside film record.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] activityType with data type Code
Indicates the type of action that was taken on this exam record during processing of this exam.. Possible values are EXAM ENTRY; EDIT BY CASE NO.; EDIT BY PATIENT; DIAGNOSIS ENTRY BY CASE NO.; EXAM STATUS TRACKING; CANCELLED; COMPLETE STATUS OVERRIDE; UPDATE STATUS; NO PURGING SPECIFIED; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] comment with data type String
The comments of the Technologist as the exam is edited - Information, pertinent to the editing of the exam.

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date/time that the action was taken.

Contains exactly one [1..1] activityType with data type Code
Indicates the type of action that was taken on this exam record during processing of this exam.. Possible values are EXAM ENTRY; EDIT BY CASE NO.; EDIT BY PATIENT; DIAGNOSIS ENTRY BY CASE NO.; EXAM STATUS TRACKING; CANCELLED; COMPLETE STATUS OVERRIDE; UPDATE STATUS; NO PURGING SPECIFIED; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] comment with data type String
The comments of the Technologist as the exam is edited - Information, pertinent to the editing of the exam.

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date/time that the action was taken.
